title: warwick is not balanced at all
body: Infinite tank with aoe cc and does endless damage with life steal after 50% wtf u thinking riot with this trash rework. as well as rek and zac.... lmao so bad at "trying" or maybe ur not trying to "balance" this game sooooooooooooooooooooooo goooooooooooooooooood

replies.body: Build thornmail, mortal reminder or nomicon, get him low (when hes strongest) then hit him with ANY finisher in the game and watch him cry :) You can even do that WITHOUT the grievous wounds if hes building tank like you said!
did you get stomped by warwick? something tells me you got stomped by warwick.
Just another bronze player complaining about balance nothing to see here folks.

as a lvl 7 {{champion:19}} who plays with an against him.. i will say, he is more balanced toward higher elo (kind of like {{champion:11}} )

he can be very hard to deal with if u dont know how.

there are certain situations where your flat out not going to win vs him unless he screws up..  you need to be aware of those and not put yourself in them.

i will certainly say he is very _close_ to being OP. definitely skirting the line. but i don't think he has passed it... maybe he will be if the meta changes... but right now i think he is just _barely_ under the "op" line
